ItemDescription.SourceString: Fires homing projectiles that seek out the target's head. Aiming down sights increases the lock-on range from 4 tiles to 12, but decreases fire rate by 50%.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Fires homing projectiles that seek out the target's head. Aiming down sights increases the lock-on range from 4 tiles to 12, but decreases fire rate by 50%.
